#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
    {
		long long number;
		scanf("%lld", &number);
		if(number==0||number==1||number==2)
			printf("1\n");
		else
		{
			long long value = (log(2*M_PI*number)/2 + number*(log(number)-1))/log(10);
			long long solution = floor(value) + 1;
			printf("%lld\n", solution);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
